equipment-plan: Drilling operations will utilize a truck-mounted drilling rig with maximum height of 32 meters. Primary equipment includes: 1) Drilling rig model DR-500 with hydraulic rotary drive, 2) Mud circulation system with 200-barrel capacity, 3) Blow-out preventer (BOP) stack rated to 5000 psi, 4) Diesel generator sets (2 x 500kW), 5) Water storage tanks (3 x 10,000 gallon capacity), 6) Site compound with welfare facilities and equipment storage.
